"...Phew.": "I suppose you've come to check in on me?"
"...Word was bound to get around, I suppose..."
"The power I use is something called \"Overboost\"."

"It was a power given to me by Zephetto
for use during my mission on Halpha."
"However, its use has been restricted to emergencies only."
"...But now, I have no need to hide that power."
"So that's why I've made no qualms about using it."
"I only intend to use it to conduct our surveys both safely and quickly."
"The other members of the team are very glad of it, besides."
"Enough about me, tell me how you've been doing."
